website_summaries.verdict: Bright, cheerful and pretty, this kids’ sprinkler from Melissa and Doug is sure to be a fun and playful way to cool off the tots on a hot day.
pros: Green base and 12 pink “petals” with openings that squirt water, this is durable and safe with no sharp edges
Shoots water higher than you might think for the cutesy look, but not in a painful way
cons: Strength of spray can depend a lot on the water pressure in your hose
Some users report leakage from the seal not being tight where it connects to the hose

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun! It is light weight but stayed in place with our heavy, kink hose. With the water barely turned on it went very high. Happy toddler happy mom.
customer_reviews.author: agorak

customer_reviews.title: Made Into A Cute Birdbath!
customer_reviews.text: I made this into a hummingbird birdbath. I wish I could say that I came up with the idea, but I saw it on Amazing Bird Stuff FB page. I just finished it, so I will see how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Sprays high with the right hose
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and tried it out. It seems to spray very well. However, there is considerable difference based on the hose you're using. With one hose of mine, it sprayed about 4 - 5 feet off the ground. With another, it was only 2 or 3 feet (which is still good enough). I would bet that the reviews which said that it didn't spray well were experiencing this issue because of their hose or water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute for smaller kids
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute for a small child. My daughter is 14 months and liked it a lot, but I wonder if it may get a little boring for her once she gets older since it doesn't move. For right now, this totally suits our needs and is very easy to use. Looking forward to using it often this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Kid Loves This Sprinkler!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this sprinkler. We actually have to hide it. The flowers are flexible, so if the are being rambunctious, it won't hurt. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5, is because so much water comes out that we constantly have to move it. If it had thinner tubes, she would enjoy it just as much and we wouldn't have to stay on the move. Otherwise, we are super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bree

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: This water sprinkler/toy works very well! I have seen some of the reviews state that the water doesn’t come out as far as they hoped. Like others have commented, that is definitely due to your water pressure and not the toy. It arrived in perfect condition, attached to our hose easily, and shot water out according to how much we opened our water (anywhere from 2 ft to 6 ft+). My almost 2 year old loved it and it is definitely something that can be enjoyed by a lot of kids with how big the sprinkler range is.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: The sprinkler is amazing! I like it because depending on how high you turn up the water the higher it sprays and then you can also make it low for the younger kiddos. My 20-month-old loves it and I play in it with him (it’s hot in Texas!). It’s exactly what I was looking for and I would recommend it to anyone with kids.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Used sprinkler?
customer_reviews.text: Looks like I was sent a used sprinkler. Finally opened it to use outside today and it's not bright like the attachments and there are parts on top that look rubbed off. It looks faded. I'm debating on sending it back or letting my toddler enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: ALLISON F

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Simple, but color fades fast
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty basic, no frills sprinkler. It works fine so far with 3 uses. I was hoping the flowers were flexible so they’d move around a little when water went through them, but no. I am disappointed that the darker pink paint faded in the sun. It doesn’t impact our use, but I’d never Gift this sprinkler knowing that now.
customer_reviews.author: JJB

customer_reviews.title: Cute but fades quick!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (4) loves this sprinkler and its very nice. I was surprised that the color faded off the top of the flowers within 3 days of having it. We are still staying home mostly and utilizing the back yard for activities. Wouldn't expect an outdoor toy to fade so quickly but it's still a sprinkler and works well.
customer_reviews.author: CHELSEA

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: This might work for a 2-year-old, but not older kids. The pressure is too weak to make the water streams go higher and more intense. Too bad I threw the box away...
customer_reviews.author: Ianina

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: My 2 years old daughter loves this. Nice quality. The stems on the flowers move around, so it's not just a cheap hunk of plastic that will break easily like I expected. Many reviews say they can't get the water to spray more than 2 feet. Without knowing this, my husband said at first that's all he could get. Then he cranked the water up all the way on the hose, and it started shooting 6-7 feet in the air. It can get there, just need to work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Sprinkler!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this exact same sprinkler for two years. It's cute and works perfect despite brutal Northeast winters. My daughter has enjoyed playing in this sprinkler during this terrible pandemic. I bought more just now to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Malik

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: As a sprinkler, it does what it says it's going to do: it sprinkles water. But don't think you're going to be the exception to the fading problem noted by the other reviewers. It went from bright pink to almost white in one day.
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraK

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: Fun little sprinkler. I don’t think the actually flowers really move though. They’re sturdy. I imagined them going crazy like the air balloons at car washes. Nonetheless we got this on a lightning deal and it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best available.
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough. There is no movement, the flowers are stationary and spray water in a prtty tight stream. If you leave it on long there will be puddles at the end of each stream, but the kids like jumping over it, and won't get hurt if they fall on it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor water use
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well unless you have highly pressurized water with a short hose.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift idea for 2-3 year olds!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these - one for a three year old, and one for a two year old. They both LOVED receiving this as a birthday gift. The sprinkler works great!
customer_reviews.author: marshallka5

customer_reviews.title: Leaks a lot, low water pressure spraying, and just a boring toy
customer_reviews.text: Only shoots water up a couple feet high and very unevenly, so it’s not very exciting. It also leaks a lot of water at the connector. Seems like a big water wasting toy so if your gonna buy it despite those flaws then I recommend that you put it on your lawn so your at least making use of all the water being wasted to hydrate your lawn. But it’s a pretty lame toy in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Threads don’t line up to connect to the hose. Bought it as a gift for my niece and it’s defective.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! These little flowers can put out some serious water spouts!! My little love it! The best thing, with the design, is so easy to make sure there is no water left to sit in it!! The flowers are soft which is great since my 2 year old likes to move and play with them! So happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Caamal

customer_reviews.title: Color fades
customer_reviews.text: The colors faded and looks old within less than a week of being outside. I read one other review about this and didn’t think anything of it, but it is a problem. It looks terrible.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Cute sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: We love this. my daughter plays with this on hot days. This is very cute and awesome no stress getting this off but the thing is it’s hard to get the hose off. But happy us happy daughter win win.
customer_reviews.author: PY

customer_reviews.title: Cute sprinkler for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sprinkler! Great for all ages, my daughters ages 9, 8 and 3 all enjoy playing in it and my husband I enjoyed cooling off in it as well! The flowers are flexible and can be slightly bent to move the direction of the individual streams. We highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyW

customer_reviews.title: Fun. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Well made fun product. My 2 yr old granddaughter had a blast with this sprinkler. She was bending the little flowers around and they bounce right back into place. Well made. Can turn pressure way up or have it come out just a little. A lot of fun for little ones either way. Colors and flowers really appealing vs a plain old sprinkler. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa  B.

customer_reviews.title: A sprinkler to love.
customer_reviews.text: It is so adorable and our toddler is going to absolutely love to play with it. She squealed with delight when she first say it spray water. A perfect sprinkler for children.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not a great sprinkler.
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed that the water only shoots out about 6-8 inches and I have good water pressure. It’s very cute but really not much fun for my Granddaughter. I should have read the reviews...
customer_reviews.author: Denise I. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Cute little sprinkler made of durable materials.
customer_reviews.text: Great sprinkler! Easy out of package use. Just screw onto the hose. Design is cute with little flowers that the water comes out from. We’ve had hours of fun with this litter sprinkler. My 2 year old daughter loves this. It is well made and does not leak at the hose connection. I would highly recommend this sprinkler.
customer_reviews.author: Regina page

customer_reviews.title: Too easy to cross-thread
customer_reviews.text: When attaching to our water hose the sprinkler always gets cross-threaded, no matter how careful you are. Because of this it’s a real pain to use and leaks a good bit of water at the hose, decreasing water pressure for the sprinkler.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really bad connection. The connector would not screw properly onto the hose end. Turns out the plastic was stripped. Had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not a good sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: Two stars for cuteness but this thing does not work well. Can put in a baby pool and would be perfect. Shoots up maybe a foot of water.
customer_reviews.author: Epps Family

customer_reviews.title: Received counterfeit or poor updated product
customer_reviews.text: Received counterfeit or poor replacement product. First picture is product received after two days in sun. Second is older product I bought at Target. This was meant to be a replacement because the original has some hose thread damage because of the plastic coupling. New product looks years old after being in the sun a couple of days!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kinner

customer_reviews.title: Would love if...
customer_reviews.text: This sprinkler is fun for the kiddos to jump and play in... I just wish the color of the flowers lasted longer than one use because after one day all of the color faded to an ugly pale pink on all the flowers
customer_reviews.author: d. johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really cute,  but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this since I love Melissa and Doug products. This item was smaller than expected. It worked for a bit, but then the hose kept disconnecting. No matter how tight we made it, it still came loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Govinda

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of people complaining about pressure with this sprinkler. The only problem is with their water pressure because this thing works great! I can adjust it by turning the water up and down which is nice because my son doesn't like it full blast. My only complaint is the seal on the sprinkler at the hose connector isn't very tight so it spits out a little water but it's not super noticable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Winter

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. The screw on piece that attached to a hose is cheap plastic that cracked at 1st try. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute, durable sprinkler. It’s a hit with my girls. I just wish they moved around a little bit . But overall great for hot days and keeping kids entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I had it sent to my sister for her 4&2 yr old grandaughters. The kids absolutely love it! A+ with the tykes!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun rides the bike around it
customer_reviews.text: This is a hit with the three year old grand baby. I put outdoor carpet on the drive and a small plastic pool. Hours of fun rides the bike around it. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Trailhound

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This little sprinkler so so cute and has a nice rubber coating on the top so it you step on it it doesn’t hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very cool - but make sure you have good water pressure
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice but make sure you have good water pressure or it won’t shoot water up very far! Other than that it’s super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Doak

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler option
customer_reviews.text: This is such a simple but effective design which means it is easy to use, durable, and engaging for kids. If the water is turned up high it is better for bigger kids, or low for little kids. My kids really love it on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Megan D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So fun! My kid loves this thing. The durable rubber makes me confident it will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this sprinkler! She's almost 2. Works well and you can adjust how high the sprays go by just turning the water flow up or down at the faucet. Four stars because the flowers faded to a pale pale pink after just a few hours in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: A. Joy

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this.... even without the water attachment she carries it around the yard..soft enough for them to play with without getting hurt but durable enough for water play.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Haag

customer_reviews.title: Color of flowers fade to white
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the flowers faded to white within a few months outside.
customer_reviews.author: GlamBlondeBombshell

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Not worth the risk of it not spraying high.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most adorable sprinkler for playtime and my daughter just loved the look. Unfortunately we suffered the same thing as other reviewers and the water just didn’t go high enough to really enjoy. We tried 2 different hoses and no difference. I ignored the warnings from other reviews, taking a chance because of the brand and the cute factor, but it didn’t work out for me. Choose something else.
customer_reviews.author: Emilyday

customer_reviews.title: it is fun for my little one to run around and through
customer_reviews.text: Works but the colors faded quickly in the sun. Its basically all green now. For that I took a star away. I would advise getting out of the sun when not using it. Ither than that, it is fun for my little one to run around and through.
customer_reviews.author: Raldain

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Sent as a gift for a 2 yr old. Son said it was surprisingly sturdy. Won’t immediately break if a child trips over it.
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift. It was a little smaller and flimsier than I thought it would be, but it was really cute. It works ok. The bursts of water don’t get very high, but it does the job and it’s fun for small kids.
customer_reviews.author: Doxie Girl

customer_reviews.title: ) absolutely loved this. I bought it for a family BBQ ...
customer_reviews.text: My nephews and nieces (and my 70lb Chocolate Lab puppy!) absolutely loved this. I bought it for a family BBQ we were having so the kids would have something to keep them cool, also along with a baby pool. They had a lot of fun playing with it. It can be really small spraying for little kids and you can also make it go decently high if you want for older kids. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BW113

customer_reviews.title: summer fun
customer_reviews.text: great summer fun for younger kids. the flowers are stationary. water sprays out from center & out in consistent (and fairly circular) pattern.
customer_reviews.author: maybreeze01

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! Works great and my kid loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kyashi

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler!
customer_reviews.text: Great sprinkler for my little one! The rubber is very soft, so easy on the feet. The only complaint I have is that after one use, some of the holes stopped pushing out water. It is still usable, but I was hoping it wouldn't stop working like that so soon. Otherwise, great sprinkler!!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Nice kids sprinkler.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little sprinkler for kids, however be aware that the spray nozzles are stiff and will not wobble crazily around for lack of a better description. So the water spray off of it is a static patern. The pressure from my hose only has water from this spray up to 4 or 5 feet high.
customer_reviews.author: B. Avery

customer_reviews.title: Summer Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for the kids to plan with the summer weather.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 months old is not a water lover, but she really enjoyed playing with this. Is a soft stream of water, you can regulate the height by slightly closing the faucet water. Perfect for babies. You may want a different style for older kids 5+.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. Water comes out very low. Faded pretty quickly
customer_reviews.author: Dahianna Thomas

customer_reviews.title: buy it
customer_reviews.text: colors totally faded in just 1 day! but....kiddos love it and spray is perfection.
customer_reviews.author: svsutej

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Both of my nieces love this toy and it worked out great for the hot summer days. Only draw back is that the height of the water squirt is less then three feet. Wish it was a little higher, maybe around four feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Know your threading!
customer_reviews.text: Has an odd black piece on the inside of the hose connector, which we thought was packaging but couldn’t remove. It was too short to thread on to our hose so we never used it.
customer_reviews.author: edpv

customer_reviews.title: Yard toy turned bird fountain
customer_reviews.text: I used this to create a bird bath. Works good with a small pump, birds are slightly amused
customer_reviews.author: Darrell R Ozbun

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and used it all summer. It is great as you can adjust how little or big the water comes out of it. The color has faded a bit from the sun but is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler for a day!
customer_reviews.text: 5/25/18 Great sprinkler!!! It sprays high and covers a good area! 5/26/18 UPDATE: day two and the sprinkler has clogged and is not really spraying anymore. Disappointed... but my sons still loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincents Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun little sprinkler. It’s perfect for my toddler who loves the water but also gets a little startled at the splash pad at the park. It doesn’t spray to high and is pretty soft.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Bogus

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit the hose
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in April to get ready for summer and it doesn’t fit on any of my 3 different garden hoses. My daughter was so disappointed and never got to play with it. I wish I had waiting to buy it, so it would still be eligible to return.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work and now can't return
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to use this summer. I guess I used them after the return period and now am stuck with them because the return period has expired. They do not work. There is a hole in the center that most of the water goes out of so the flowers don't spray.
customer_reviews.author: reedarosa

customer_reviews.title: Spring Flowers in the sun.
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot but the colors faded the first day outside making it appear old and dingy.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Vonnegut

customer_reviews.title: Non-functional
customer_reviews.text: The sprinkler would not even screw on to the hose- the threads will not track with the hose head. Completely useless. This item was purchased as a gift in late May, but with the unseasonably cool & rainy weather all June, it has been on the shelf. It's finally warm in Chicago, & we can't use the sprinkler to cool off. And to make matters worse the "return window" is closed. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Strasser

customer_reviews.title: Fun for summer
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this for summer fun. But we left it outside and after the first rainstorm we had all of the color disappeared. It doesn’t look the same but still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: Too cute! I like the fact that it is soft and safe for kids/pets. I set it up for hummingbirds.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Hose connection piece wasn’t long enough so the hose couldn’t screw in all the way resulting in water squirting out of the connector piece instead of the flowers as shown. Got for my daughters birthday, she was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Tremblay

customer_reviews.title: Not a long life
customer_reviews.text: The sprinkler is cute but after about 3 weeks of almost daily use the nob came off and now we can't use it. Also, the color faded as others have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Flexible sprinkler spouts are safe for kids
customer_reviews.text: This sprinkler is cute and the flower spouts are flexible so if a child falls on it, they aren't going to get hurt. It's cute and I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: looks like a blast
customer_reviews.text: To replace a water toy that I purchased and never really worked. I was hesitant b/c my daughter is 5, but she loves it. It shoots water high into the air - looks like a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t attach well to hose at all and very underwhelming water flow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I got it for my 15 month ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I got it for my 15 month old and she loves it! I like that I can make the water spray very high or low depending on the faucet! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer gift
customer_reviews.text: We gifted this to a toddler and it was a huge hit, the family loves it and finds it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: L Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it and gives a decently high sprinkles
customer_reviews.author: Brownie45

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this. I have great water pressure so this works well. Sprays really wide and high. Don't keep this out in the sun though, the pretty colors will fade and rubber material will crack.
customer_reviews.author: jenerationmama

customer_reviews.title: Not up to par with M&D products
customer_reviews.text: Faded in 2 days. Really disappointed over that aspect. It works okay, nothing special. I would not buy it again or recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice but the color of the flowers fades a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Priftakis

customer_reviews.title: Looks of product after such a short time.....
customer_reviews.text: Item has faded so quickly in the 8 -10 weeks we have had it. And it is not in direct sunlight. So disappointing..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright & colorful & easy to attach to hose
customer_reviews.text: 2 yr. old granddaughter loves it. I keep the water pressure on the low side now & she laughs & giggles while running through the sprinkler. Bright & colorful & easy to attach to hose.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year old grand daughter. She loves playing in it. The spray goes pretty far as well.
customer_reviews.author: KDG

customer_reviews.title: Less than one month, and cute color is gone!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and my girls do you love it, but it is already very faded from the sun. Whatever they use to color the flowers is not colorfast/resilient to the sun; this is somewhat disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Song S.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun for 2-10 year olds. Hours of fun! Sturdy. Used for a 2 year old birthday party and was the hit of the afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: JRL

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and fun! I was worried that not enough water would squirt out but it wasnt a problem at all! Lots of water! My girls really enjoy playing in the water!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was really cute for about 2 weeks then the color faded, plastic chipped & went in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Let the kids help water your lawn
customer_reviews.text: Great little sprinkler. Just be careful the rubber insert doesn’t fall out. The kids had lots of fun with it this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Granchildren love it, and it is soft enough that they won't get hurt if they fall on it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lore

customer_reviews.title: Needed in Florida
customer_reviews.text: Sun damaged really quickly, but my daughter doesn't care that all the flowers are the same color now.
customer_reviews.author: C G Pendergrass

customer_reviews.title: Hard to adjust the nozzles
customer_reviews.text: Colors faded with two uses! Was properly stored in deck box as well
customer_reviews.author: Pennyroyal

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. I was extremely surprise how much our ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I was extremely surprise how much our Lorenzo likes this. His Mom is very happy also. He loves water so this is a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Hope394

customer_reviews.title: So sad!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute but the water didn’t spurt out of it very good!
customer_reviews.author: Savvylove

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR VERY YOUNG CHILDREN!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, well made, and a perfect size for our two-year-old granddaughter. She was fearful of the larger sprinklers we tried and this one is very tame - you can adjust the stream with the water flow and there are no moving parts i.e. the water doesn't fly all over the place. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CAC

customer_reviews.title: fun in the water
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these - one for my grandchildren who LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, and more importantly my grand niece loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline weigel

customer_reviews.title: Fun.  Would recommend this to my friends.
customer_reviews.text: Fun in the sun. My 2 year-old great niece loves this. So does her mother.
customer_reviews.author: WMontefusco

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sprinkler. Sturdily built and perfect for my 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Sunny Patch Pretty Petals Sprinkler Toy
product_meta.description:
Style:SprinklerWith the Pretty Petals Sprinkler, the flowers water you! This sweet and whimsical outdoor sprinkler features pretty pink flowers on a green base, all made from durable materials. It attaches easily to a hose for outdoor fun for the whole family, as well an adorable way to water the garden. The sprinkler encourages outdoor active play and helps develop coordination. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully-designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” We design every toy to the highest-quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!

BRAND STORY
By Melissa & Doug

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!

See more
feature_bullets: Features 12 Pretty Petals flowers that each squirt water
Constructed from durable materials for outdoor use
Promotes outdoor active play and develops coordination
Outdoor fun for the entire family
